meta.description: Optimize the production of plastic containers to minimize total cost while meeting demand.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each container type in cm^3

params.name: demand
params.description: Demand for each container type in units

params.name: variable_cost
params.description: Variable cost per unit for each container type in ¥

params.name: fixed_cost
params.description: Fixed cost for using equipment for each container type in ¥

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units produced for each container type

vars.name: y
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if equipment for a container type is used

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(variable_cost[c] * x[c] + fixed_cost * y[c] for c in CONTAINERS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost including variable and fixed costs

constraints.name: fixed_cost_activation_1
constraints.description: Activate fixed cost for container type 1 if produced

constraints.name: fixed_cost_activation_2
constraints.description: Activate fixed cost for container type 2 if produced

constraints.name: fixed_cost_activation_3
constraints.description: Activate fixed cost for container type 3 if produced

constraints.name: fixed_cost_activation_4
constraints.description: Activate fixed cost for container type 4 if produced

constraints.name: fixed_cost_activation_5
constraints.description: Activate fixed cost for container type 5 if produced

constraints.name: fixed_cost_activation_6
constraints.description: Activate fixed cost for container type 6 if produced
